name: 3D Isometric - Car Police Chase Driver Racing KIT
name_original: 3D Isometric - Car Police Chase Driver Racing KIT
description:
Controls:

W to accelerate.

S to break/reverse.

A or D to steer left and right.

H to horn.

P to pause game.

F to switch on lights.

3D Isometric - Car Police Chase Driver KITis the ultimate complete project to a complete fully ready-to-use unity project with complete features. Create driving, racing and police chase type games in just a couple of minutes. It includes drive-able player cars, friendly A.I cars, over 50+ prefabs, score system, advance car system, item pickups, health, police chase and much more to create your own driving and racing sandbox game easy. You can download the full game source on here.
